jenkins.plugins.publish__over__ssh.BapSs.execCommand: cd www/la-vergne WPDBNAME=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_NAME' | cut -d \' -f 4` WPDBUSER=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_USER' | cut -d \' -f 4` WPDBPASS=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_PASSWORD' | cut -d \' -f 4` WPDBHOST=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_HOST' | cut -d \' -f 4 | cut -d : -f 1` WPDBPORT=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_HOST' | cut -d \' -f 4 | cut -d : -f 2` if [ "$WPDBPORT" == "$WPDBHOST" ]; then echo "Port non prÃ©sent pour le mysqldump" mysqldump -h $WPDBHOST -u $WPDBUSER -p$WPDBPASS $WPDBNAME > export_database.sql else echo "Port prÃ©sent pour le mysqldump" mysqldump -h $WPDBHOST -u $WPDBUSER -p$WPDBPASS $WPDBNAME -P $WPDBPORT > export_database.sql fi git add . -v git commit --author="Timothee Via Jenkins <timotheebarreteau@gmail.com>" -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true
